item.title: Interactive NCAA Hockey Player Maps using ggmap, ggimage, ggiraph, and leaflet
item.description: Code for the maps can be found on Github Note that some of the maps on this page are static. To interact with the maps, visit the Shiny app Been looking at some NCAA hockey data lately. Have a few ideas kicking around, none of which are really beyond the idea stage at this point… In the meantime, since I haven’t posted anything in a while, I figured I could at least put up something fun. So here are some maps of the men’s NCAA hockey players’ hometowns, which I made using a bunch of packages in R, namely ggmap, ggimage, ggiraph and leaflet.
